text: For promotional reasons (ie tweets), it would be great to have a version of our nilearn with a tagline below it saying "Easier machine learning for neuroimaging". This should be done by first creating a new version of our SVG (https://github.com/nilearn/nilearn/blob/master/doc/logos/scikit-learn-logo.svg) with the tagline, and then exporting it to PNG.
